name: Super Duelling Minivans
description: Super Duelling Minivans was born out of an idea to entirely create a new game in 24 hours. Programmers Chris Rhinehart and Jason Blochowiak got together with artist Rowan Atalla back in 1996 to lose some sleep and hop to it, creating a fun and challenging game in just 24 hours. They blew it. It took them 33 hours and a whole lot of caffeine, but what they came up with was Dueling Mini-Vans. Then they went back and added a few enhancements so that we could now proudly present this fine game of mindless mayhem to you, the unsuspecting gaming audience.
